'''''The Proof of Existence''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to enter Caribert's realm of consciousness during the {{Quest|World-Order Narration}}.

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement in the Spanish translation is a shortening of the Latin phrase {{Lang|la=''Cogito, ergo sum''|la_tl=I think, therefore I am,|mini=1}} attributed to French philosopher {{w|René Descartes}}.
